title: Invincible Website
description: A pixel-perfect clone of the Invincible Tourist website built using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, created to strengthen my fundamentals in layout structuring, responsive design, and visual accuracy.

title: Netflix clone
description: A Netflix homepage UI clone developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as a learning project to practice layout structuring, styling, and UI replication.

title: Movie React App
description: A React movie app with user authentication pages (login & register), showcasing form validation, component-based UI, and structured navigation for user entry into the application.

title: Expense Tracker
description: An expense tracker app that helps users monitor income and expenses with basic charts.

title: Obys Website
description: A motion-focused website built with Shery.js, CSS animations, and modern JavaScript, featuring smooth scroll-based effects and dynamic interactions.
